    • addSignerInformation

      protected void addSignerInformation(SignatureValidationReportType signatureValidationReportType, X509Certificate signerCertificate, String hashAlgoId)
      Add signer information. The reason for the sneaky throws annotation is because the exception case is impossible as it can only be triggered by a bad or null certificate, but this certificate has already been processed and would have caused errors before reaching this point, had it been corrupt.
      Parameters:
      signatureValidationReportType - signature validation report element to be extended
      signerCertificate - signer certificate
      hashAlgoId - hash algorithm

    • addSignerAttributes

      protected SubIndication addSignerAttributes(SignatureValidationReportType signatureValidationReportType, R sigValResult, String hashAlgoId)
      Add signer attributes to the signature validation report
      Parameters:
      signatureValidationReportType - the signature validation report object for this signature
      sigValResult - signature validation result for this signature
      hashAlgoId - hash algorithm used to hash data
      Returns:
      An error sub indication if some error is encountered or else null (no error)

    • getBestSignatureTime

      Obtain the signature proof of existence time (POE)
      Parameters:
      sigValResult - signature validation result
      currentTime - current time
      hashAlgoId - hash algorithm used to hash data
      Returns:
      proof of existence time data

      protected SubIndication addSignatureIdentifier(SignatureValidationReportType signatureValidationReportType, R sigValResult, String hashAlgoId)
      Add a signature identifier for a signature in the signature validation report
      Parameters:
      signatureValidationReportType - the signature validation report object for this signature
      sigValResult - result from validating this signature
      hashAlgoId - the hash algorithm used to hash data
      Returns:
      An error sub indication if some error is encountered or else null (no error)

    • getValidationObejctMap

      protected Map<String,ValidationObject> getValidationObejctMap(List<R> validationResults, SigvalReportOptions sigvalReportOptions) throws CertificateEncodingException, NoSuchAlgorithmException
      Get all the validation objects for all associated signatures and associated timestamps.

      Validation objects are stored separately in ETSI signature validation reports as a common reference source to mainly certificates and timestamps referred to in the report.

      Parameters:
      validationResults - the signature validation results
      Returns:
      A map of validation objects to be included in the signature validation report
      Throws:
      CertificateEncodingException
      NoSuchAlgorithmException

    • getHashAlgo

      protected String getHashAlgo(R validationResult)
      Determine the hash algorithm to be used to hash data and to identify hash algorithm for hashed data in the signature validation report
      Parameters:
      validationResult - the validation result from which hashed data may be extracted
      Returns:
      the suitable hash algorithm to be used in the signature validation report
